snippet.title: HEAVY RAIN OFFICIAL PC TRAILER
snippet.description:
Buy now: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/heavy-rain/home
The highly acclaimed game Heavy Rain™ is coming to PC for the first time ever!

The classic title, previously only available on PlayStation® consoles, is brought to PC with stunning visuals including 4K resolution, widescreen compatibility, and 60 fps framerate.

Subscribe on YouTube: https://bit.ly/2kFt1FE
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialquanticdream
Twitter: https://twitter.com/quantic_dream
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/quanticdreamgames/
